aws_encryption_sdk.identifiersÂ¶

AWS Encryption SDK native data structures for defining implementation-specific characteristics.

class aws_encryption_sdk.identifiers.EncryptionSuite(algorithm, mode, data_key_length, iv_length, auth_length, auth_key_length=0)Â¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Static definition of encryption algorithm details.

Warning

These members must only be used as part of an AlgorithmSuite.

Parameters

  • algorithm (cryptography.io ciphers algorithm object) â Encryption algorithm to use

  • mode (cryptography.io ciphers modes object) â Encryption mode in which to operate

  • data_key_length (int) â Number of bytes in envelope encryption data key

  • iv_length (int) â Number of bytes in IV

  • auth_length (int) â Number of bytes in auth data (tag)

  • auth_key_length (int) â Number of bytes in auth key (not currently supported by any algorithms)

Prepare a new EncryptionSuite.

valid_kdf(kdf)Â¶

Determine whether a KDFSuite can be used with this EncryptionSuite.

Parameters

kdf (aws_encryption_sdk.identifiers.KDFSuite) â KDFSuite to evaluate

Return type

bool

class aws_encryption_sdk.identifiers.KDFSuite(algorithm, input_length, hash_algorithm)Â¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Static definition of key derivation algorithm details.

Warning

These members must only be used as part of an AlgorithmSuite.

Parameters

  • algorithm (cryptography.io KDF object) â KDF algorithm to use

  • input_length (int) â Number of bytes of input data to feed into KDF function

  • hash_algorithm (cryptography.io hashes object) â Hash algorithm to use in KDF

Prepare a new KDFSuite.

input_length(encryption)Â¶

Determine the correct KDF input value length for this KDFSuite when used with a specific EncryptionSuite.

Parameters

encryption (aws_encryption_sdk.identifiers.EncryptionSuite) â EncryptionSuite to use

Return type

int

class aws_encryption_sdk.identifiers.AuthenticationSuite(algorithm, hash_algorithm, signature_length)Â¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Static definition of authentication algorithm details.

Warning

These members must only be used as part of an AlgorithmSuite.

Parameters

  • algorithm (may vary (currently only ECC curve object)) â Information needed by signing algorithm to define behavior

  • hash_algorithm (cryptography.io hashes object) â Hash algorithm to use in signature

  • signature_lenth (int) â Number of bytes in signature

Prepare a new AuthenticationSuite.

class aws_encryption_sdk.identifiers.AlgorithmSuite(algorithm_id, encryption, kdf=<KDFSuite.NONE: (None, None, None)>, authentication=<AuthenticationSuite.NONE: (None, None, 0)>, allowed=True)Â¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Static combinations of encryption, KDF, and authentication algorithms.

Warning

No AlgorithmSuites except those defined here are supported.

Parameters

  • algorithm_id (int) â KMS Encryption Algorithm ID

  • encryption_suite (aws_encryption_sdk.identifiers.EncryptionSuite) â EncryptionSuite to use with this AlgorithmSuite

  • kdf_suite (aws_encryption_sdk.identifiers.KDFSuite) â KDFSuite to use with this AlgorithmSuite

  • authentication_suite (aws_encryption_sdk.identifiers.AuthenticationSuite) â AuthenticationSuite to use with this AlgorithmSuite

Prepare a new AlgorithmSuite.

Determine the correct KDF input value length for this algorithm suite.

Return the algorithm suite ID as a 2-byte array

class aws_encryption_sdk.identifiers.WrappingAlgorithm(encryption_type, algorithm, padding_type, padding_algorithm, padding_mgf)Â¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Wrapping Algorithms for use by RawMasterKey objects.

Parameters

  • padding_type â Padding type to use for encryption of data keys

  • padding_algorithm â Padding algorithm to use for encryption of data keys

  • padding_mgf â Padding MGF to use for encryption of data keys
